description: Support Linguami and unlock unlimited access to language learning features. Premium membership helps us create more content and improve the platform.
feature_unlimited_dictionary: Unlimited word addition to your personal dictionary
feature_flashcards: Flashcard system to review your vocabulary
support_content_creation: Dedicate more time to creating content for the site
support_interactive_activities: Dedicate more time to developing interactive activities for learning words or testing your knowledge
support_hosting_costs: Finance part of the site hosting costs and use of paid services like the translator, server, etc.
support_appreciation: Be happy to see that you appreciate our work and find it useful.
